text:
@Yamiche So, that’s either Trump or Pence. Placing a numbers game over lives. As they have since Day. One. This is just one reason why the world pities America.
#TrumpLiesAmericansDie #coronavirus #COVID19 #CDCReport #LeadershipMatters
